_header: How that Abel sometime had a double corn
_description: Abel and Eli as types of purity — ten lines (abcbccddef)

CULDd1050.First Lines:
Howe that abell sumtyme had a double cornOon for his feithfull
                    trewe sacrifice…
CULDd1050.Last Lines:
…Bodie & all in a chare of fireffor he him h kept from all
                    corrupcioun
CULDd1050.Note:
Added to lower margins by a late fifteenth- to sixteenth-century
                    hand.
